data: PED AMB Iron Sucrose Infusion qweekly for 3 week (Day of Treatment)
Ensure anaphylaxis kit is available prior to initiating Iron Sucrose Infusion

Calculate total iron deficit:
Patients less than or equal to35 kg:
Total iron deficit (mg) = [body weight (kg) x (130 g/L – Hb (g/L)) x 0.24] + 15 mg/kg 
Where 130 g/L = target haemoglobin level, and 15 mg/kg = depot iron

Patients greater than 35 kg:
Total iron deficit (mg) = [body weight (kg) x (150 g/L - Hb (g/L)) x 0.24] + 500 mg 
Where 150 g/L = target haemoglobin level, and 500 mg = depot iron

Maximum daily dose is 7 mg/kg/day or 300 mg/day

If the total iron deficit exceeds the maximum daily dose of 7 mg/kg/day or 300 mg/day, the total dose must be divided and given every 3 to 7 days until total dose administered.
